Module dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform
Package dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.event

Interface EventLoop

All Known Implementing Classes:
EventLoop.Broadcasting, GameSystem
public interface EventLoop
Supports registration of event handlers and enqueuing of event instances.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes 
    Modifier and Type Interface Description
    static class  EventLoop.Broadcasting
    An EventLoop implementation supporting broadcasting events.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void enqueue​(Event event)
    Queues an event to broadcast to all registered receivers.
    <E extends Event>
    void    		 register​(java.lang.Class<E> type, java.util.function.Consumer<? super E> receiver)
    Registers to receive broadcasts of an event.

  • Method Details

    • register

      Registers to receive broadcasts of an event.
      Parameters:

      receiver - action invoked on event reception

      Queues an event to broadcast to all registered receivers.
